actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that for purposes of the personal exemption deduction a handicapped individual who is employed or receiving training as a sheltered workshop shall be treated the same as a student at an educational institution.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a taxpayer to take a personal exemption for a dependent who is a handicapped individual participating in a sheltered workshop.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that for purposes of the personal exemption deduction a handicapped individual who is employed or receiving training as a sheltered workshop shall be treated the same as a student at an educational institution.
